const Greeter = await ethers.getContractFactory("Greeter");
await greeter.greet();
await greeter.setGreeting("Hi ETH!");
await greeter.greet(); 
const greeter = await Greeter.attach("YOUR_CONTRACT_ADDRESS_HERE");
